anime.description: The "Nyanbo" are creatures with square bodies with ears and tails that came to Earth from outer space. There`s Tora, who dreams of repairing their broken UFO and returning to space, as well as his sister Kotora, the precocious Shiro, the mischievous Mike, the mysterious Kuro, and many more. All of these Nyanbos are now happily living much like cats, free-spirited and sometimes getting into trouble, in places that humans don`t know about. Source: crunchyroll Note: Nyanbo is a cat version of the Danboard cardboard robot character within http://anidb.net/cr3939 [Azuma Kiyohiko]`s Yotsuba&! manga.

tag.name: original work
tag.description: What the anime is based on! This is given as the original work credit in the OP. Mostly of academic interest, but a useful bit of info, hinting at the possible depth of story.

tag.name: new
tag.description: Not based on anything, the story is a new work, usually made up by the people involved in creating the anime. Generally if an original work (原作) credit is given, it will be to the studio, or director, or other members of the production team.

tag.name: real-world location
tag.description: Places seen in the show exist in reality. Note: This could be sometime in the future, though names and certain places will still be recognizable.

tag.name: photographic backgrounds
tag.description: Real-life backgrounds, with the possible addition of a few 2D elements are shown / used in the anime.

tag.name: CGI
tag.description: Computer-generated imagery (CGI) or computer animation is the art of creating moving images via the use of computers. It is a subfield of computer graphics and animation. Increasingly it is created by means of 3D computer graphics, though 2D computer graphics are still widely used for stylistic, low bandwidth, and faster real-time rendering needs. Sometimes the target of the animation is the computer itself, but sometimes the target is another medium, such as film.

tag.name: short episodes
tag.description: Short episodes are regular episodes that are much shorter than the standard length. This means up to and including 10 minutes; shows with episodes that are 11 to 20 minutes in length are http://anidb.net/t6494 [half-length episodes] instead. Not to be confused with http://anidb.net/t6349 [multi-segment episodes], which are regular episodes that are split into several short segments (parts), usually with separate titles and independent storylines.

tag.name: live-action imagery
tag.description: This anime incorporates still images and/or video footage of real-world objects and locations into the animation.

tag.name: 3D CG animation
tag.description: Abbreviation for "three-dimensional computer generated animation" or "computer graphics" (CGI). The traditional 2D art is enhanced by 3D imagery developed through computer modeling software. Done in the right way, this union of 3D in a 2D animated world can be a very beautiful relationship. The difference lies in what lacks the traditional 2D animation all together and may give term to something produced entirely with 3D graphics (such as the 2006 remake of "Appleseed" , 2007`s "Vexille", the 2008 addition to the "Biohazard" series and the more well known "Final Fantasy: The Spirits Within" and "Advent Children").

tag.name: technical aspects
tag.description: It may sometimes be useful to know about technical aspects of a show, such as information about its broadcasting or censorship. Such information can be found here.

episode.title: かわいくなりたい!
I Want to Be Cute!
Wakaiku Naritai!
episode.summary: Shiro wants her beloved Tora so call her cute, so she tries her hardest to doll herself up and bake cute desserts for him... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: がんばりやミケ
Mike the Hard Worker
Ganbariya Mike
episode.summary: Mike is always full of energy, but today he`s a little too energetic and makes a mess of the Nyanbo`s attic room. When the others yell at him, he starts to feel depressed... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: キラキラがすき
We Love Sparkly Things
Kirakira ga Suki
episode.summary: Tora and friends are searching for UFO pieces in the park when two flashy Nyanbo who dream of being idols, Sabatora and Kijitora, appear. Can the two of them help find the next piece of the UFO? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ほしからきたネコ
The Cats That Came from the Stars
Hoshi kara Kita Neko
episode.summary: Tora is hard at work looking for pieces of the Nyanbo`s UFO again today... but the other Nyanbo just want to laze around, sharpen their claws, and act like cats. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: にゃんぼーのひみつ
The Nyanbo`s Secret
Nyanbo no Himitsu
episode.summary: Tora and the other Nyanbo wonder why they behave so much like cats sometimes, and they decide to do some research on cats to find out. Will they find an answer? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ともだちどうし
Friends
Tomodachi Doushi
episode.summary: Tora has found an unusual UFO piece, but he can`t figure out how to use it. Then Blaze shows up and offers to help him. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: くろいにゃんぼー
The Black Nyanbo
Kuroi Nyanbo
episode.summary: Tora and the others are playing in the park when they notice a dark figure watching them! They follow it and find themselves face to face with some scary-looking Nyanbo. Are they friend or foe? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: トラとコトラ
Tora and Kotora
Tora to Kotora
episode.summary: Tora wants to go out and look for UFO pieces, but Kotora has their friends wrapped around her little finger. Then they meet a mother cat with her kittens, and Kotora starts acting strange... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: しょうぶはサッカー!?
The Battle Is Soccer?!
Shoubu wa Soccer!?
episode.summary: When Wild Black and the Mecha Nyanbo get into a fight over disputed turf, Tora jumps in to stop them with the suggestion of a soccer battle to settle the issue. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: さいこうのなかま
The Greatest Friends
Saikou no Nakama
episode.summary: The Mecha Nyanbo, led by Alpha, keep finding UFO pieces before Tora and his friends. Tora is getting anxious, so he asks the others for help, but it seems they don`t see him as their leader... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ぐるぐるをさがして
In Search of a Swirly
Guruguru o Sagashite
episode.summary: Tora is looking for a spiral-shaped UFO piece. His sister Kotora goes out to try to find it for him, but without much luck. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: もしかしてライバル?
Is This a Rival?
Moshikashite Rival?
episode.summary: Tora encounters some strange-looking Nyanbo carrying away a UFO piece that he found. The strangers look a bit like robots. What is it they`re trying to do? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: パーティーしようぜ
Let`s Have a Party
Party Shiyou ze
episode.summary: Tora and Kotora are decorating the attic for a Christmas party. But as their friends arrive, they all seem to have the wrong idea about what Christmas is, so the party isn`t getting very far. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: なやみがない
No Stress
Nayami ga Nai
episode.summary: Mike is offended when Tora accuses him of having no stress in his life. He insists that there are others out there who have no stress, and goes out to town with Kotora to find them. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: クロのいちにち
A Day in Kuro`s Life
Kuro no Ichinichi
episode.summary: Blaze insists to Shiro that he knows Kuro better than anyone else. But as he observes Kuro, he discovers more and more of his mysterious sides... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: きょうふのマイク
The Microphone of Terror
Kyoufu no Mike
episode.summary: Something that appears to be a microphone pops out of a UFO piece. Mike picks it up and suddenly wants to sing. Then the rest of the gang shows up, and the Nyanbo`s singing contest is underway! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: じかんよとまれ
Stop, Time
Jikan yo Tomare
episode.summary: A strange phenomenon has all the clocks in town running behind, and it seems to be caused by a UFO piece in the area. Tora, along with Alpha of the Mecha Nyanbo, rack their brains to solve its mysteries. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: にいちゃんキライ
I Hate You, Nii-chan
Nii-chan Kirai
episode.summary: Kotora loses the beloved teddy bear that the others gave to her. When Tora learns of this and scolds her, she runs from the house and ends up missing. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: メカ! メカ! メカ!
Mecha! Mecha! Mecha!
Mecha! Mecha! Mecha!
episode.summary: Alpha and the Mecha Nyanbo have come to the attic room where Tora and his friends live. He tells Tora that instead of fighting over UFO pieces, he wants to be friends and play nice from now on... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: みんなでアイドル
Everyone`s an Idol
Minna de Idol
episode.summary: Sabatora and Kijitora dream of becoming idols. They add Kotora and Shiro to their group, and the four of them begin training to become the #1 idols in the world. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: どうぶつえんじけん
The Zoo Incident
Doubutsuen Jiken
episode.summary: The Nyanbos learn that when they scan an animal with the new UFO piece they just found, they can take the form of that animal. So they all take a trip to the zoo with the goal of becoming whichever animal they want. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: これがビッグオメガだ!
This Is Big Omega!
Kore ga Big Omega Da!
episode.summary: Tora`s UFO has been stolen by Alpha and his Mecha Nyanbo. To steal the final UFO piece, Alpha pilots the gigantic Big Omega and chases Tora and his friends all around town. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: よるのピクニック
Evening Picnic
Yoru no Picnic
episode.summary: Shiro is overjoyed to be on a picnic alone with Tora... but ends up disappointed when Mike, Kotora, and Kuro show up. Then she falls asleep and awakens to find that it`s nighttime... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: がっこうにいきたい
I Want to Go to School
Gakkou ni Ikitai
episode.summary: Studying, eating a provided lunch... After listening to the others talk about what school is like, Kotora declares that she wants to try going to school. So they begin a pretend school day, with each of the Nyanbo taking turns playing the teacher... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ほしへゆくネコ
Cats Heading for the Stars
Hoshi e Yuku Neko
episode.summary: The repairs on the UFO are complete, and Tora takes off toward outer space with Kotora, Mike, Shiro, and Kuro. Left behind on Earth, the other Nyanbo watch a recorded message from Tora with tears in their eyes... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ひらめいたトラ
Tora Gets an Idea
Hirameita Tora
episode.summary: Tora is depressed after his UFO test flight failed. To try to cheer him up, Tora`s friends ask for help from Alpha of the Mecha Nyanbo... Source: crunchyroll
